trans-unit.source: Specifies the edge or edges of an activity designer on a workflow design surface where design-time processing is performed, such as a <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector" /> location on the activity designer.
trans-unit.target: 指定工作流程設計介面上的活動設計工具邊緣，其為設計階段處理執行的地方，例如活動設計工具上的 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector" /> 位置。

trans-unit.source: The enumeration value returned from <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint.ConnectionEdge%2A> that specifies where on the activity designer a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint> or a collection of <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint> objects reside.
trans-unit.target: 從 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint.ConnectionEdge%2A> 傳回的列舉值，指定了 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint> 或 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint> 物件的集合於活動設計工具中所在的位置。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.GetConnectionPoints%2A> method can be used to retrieve this collection.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.GetConnectionPoints%2A> 方法可以用來擷取此集合。

trans-unit.source: You can also use it to determine which edge or edges of an activity designer a user is resizing by observing the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerEdges> enumeration value returned from <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerResizeEventArgs.SizingEdge%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以藉由觀察 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerEdges> 傳回的 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerResizeEventArgs.SizingEdge%2A>列舉值，判斷使用者正在重新調整大小的活動設計工具邊緣。

trans-unit.source: All edges of the activity designer.
trans-unit.target: 活動設計工具的所有邊緣。

trans-unit.source: The bottom edge of the activity designer.
The left edge of the activity designer.
None of the edges of the activity designer.
trans-unit.target: 沒有活動設計工具的邊緣。

trans-unit.source: The right edge of the activity designer.
The top edge of the activity designer.
